message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to counteroffer at $130.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $142. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I understand Alice, but I would like to stick to my previous counteroffer of $130. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $138? It's a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for considering my perspective, Alice. I'd like to counteroffer at $135. This seems to be a reasonable compromise for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. It's still a good deal for you, and it's getting close to my minimum price.
I see, Alice. I'd like to counteroffer at $137. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while also being fair to both of us.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $139. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I'd like to counteroffer at $138. This price seems to be a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
